abstract: Militants ambush Indian army convoy traveling in Manipur State, killing 20 soldiers and wounding 11; Manipur, in India's remote northeast, has 41 militant groups and government is in peace talks with 36.
lead_paragraph: The attack on a convoy of army vehicles on Thursday by militants in the remote northeast of India is one of the deadliest confrontations in recent years.

headline.main: 20 Indian Soldiers Killed in Ambush in Manipur
headline.print_headline: World Briefing | Asia; India: At Least 20 Soldiers Die in Attack

snippet: The attack on a convoy of army vehicles on Thursday by militants in the remote northeast of India is one of the deadliest confrontations in recent years.
